pages.text: $(thing)Energy$() is your body's natural resource which governs movement and action.$(br)You use $(thing)Energy$() whenever you attempt to perform a special move or attack, even if you don't have enough.$(br2)You'll recover $(thing)Energy$() naturally over time, at a fairly quick pace.
pages.title: Energy

pages.text: Fully draining your $(thing)energy$() reserves, or taking damage will temporarily halt your $(thing)energy$() regeneration, so be careful when using it in the field.$(br)Total depletion in particular will halt regeneration for a noticeable period of time, so try not to drain yourself completely.
Visit the official $(aoa) wiki page for more information.
